dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev really didn't mince words at that APK session, did he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev really didn't mince words at that A P K session, did he?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: No, he uh, he called out some international NGOs pretty directly—mentioned their cynicism and greed, which is, like, a strong accusation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, he uh, he called out some international NGOs pretty directly-mentioned their cynicism and greed, which is, like, a strong accusation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Recent disclosures about the activities of foreign non-governmental organizations have revealed their cynicism, greed, and indifference to Kazakhstan " as well as the dark side of certain well-known Kazakhstani grant recipients.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he made it clear that Kazakhstan isn't gonna solve its problems by following someone else's playbook. They're sticking to their own laws and national interests.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he made it clear that Kazakhstan isn't gonna solve its problems by following someone else's playbook. They're sticking to their own laws and national interests.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But we will solve them not based on someone else's playbook, but according to our own legislation and national interests.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense, you know? Every country's got issues, but they wanna handle it their own way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense, you know? Every country's got issues, but they wanna handle it their own way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And he emphasized that ideological confrontation just isn't part of their worldview—they're all about unity through traditions and values.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And he emphasized that ideological confrontation just isn't part of their worldview-they're all about unity through traditions and values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State emphasized that ideological confrontation is completely foreign to the country's worldview. Our nation is united and cemented into a single historical, cultural, and political community by long-standing traditions and values, our mentality, and our way of life, he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan is actually turning 30 this year, right? That's a long time bringing different ethnic groups together.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan is actually turning thirty this year, right? That's a long time bringing different ethnic groups together.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year marks the 30th anniversary of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It is—and Dmitry Ostankovich called it a key platform for shared values, not just preserving culture but also fostering respect and unity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It is-and Dmitry Ostankovich called it a key platform for shared values, not just preserving culture but also fostering respect and unity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The APK is a key public platform that brings together people of different nationalities, cultures, and traditions around shared Kazakhstani values, said Deputy Chairman of the APK Dmitry Ostankovich earlier. According to him, the assembly's role goes beyond preserving cultural heritage " it fosters an atmosphere of mutual respect, civic responsibility, and unity.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that session back in April was even titled "Unity. Creation. Progress." So it's clearly a big theme for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that session back in April was even titled Unity. Creation. Progress. So it's clearly a big theme for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The 33rd session, titled Unity. Creation. Progress, was held in Astana on April 24"25, 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Tokayev chairs the APK himself, so he's really invested in that message of national cohesion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Tokayev chairs the A P K himself, so he's really invested in that message of national cohesion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan serves as the Chair of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though—he didn't name specific NGOs, just referred to recent disclosures. I wonder what exactly came to light.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though-he didn't name specific NGOs, just referred to recent disclosures. I wonder what exactly came to light.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the 34th session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan (APK), the President said recent revelations had exposed the true motives of certain international NGOs. Recent disclosures about the activities of foreign non-governmental organizations have revealed their cynicism, greed, and indifference to Kazakhstan " as well as the dark side of certain well-known Kazakhstani grant recipients.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that part was kinda vague, but he definitely wanted to make a point about outside influence versus homegrown solutions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that part was kinda vague, but he definitely wanted to make a point about outside influence versus homegrown solutions.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And you can tell he's confident that both citizens and international partners get where he's coming from.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And you can tell he's confident that both citizens and international partners get where he's coming from.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am confident that our citizens and well-meaning international partners understand this logic well, Tokayev said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you think about how other countries might be reacting to statements like that, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you think about how other countries might be reacting to statements like that, you know?
